tidbits.title: Spice Isle
tidbits.description: Grenada is known as the 'Spice Isle' for its production of nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon, and other spices, offering aromatic experiences for visitors.

tidbits.title: Stunning Beaches
tidbits.description: The island boasts stunning beaches with crystal-clear waters, white sands, and picturesque coves, ideal for snorkeling, diving, and relaxation.

tidbits.title: Rich Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: Grenada's rich cultural heritage is reflected in traditions like the energetic Carnival celebrations, vibrant music, and the warmth of its people.
